ingredients.content: 6 - 8 oz asparagus, woody ends removed, cut into 1 in. pieces
¼ tsp freshly ground black pepper, to taste

preparations.content: Place asparagus into mixing bowl and chop <b>8 sec/speed 4<b> (see Tip).
Add butter, flour, cream, milk, stock paste and pepper and cook <b>8 min/200°F/speed 2<b>. Pour into bowls and serve immediately.
